Title: Cross-realm trust vulnerability in Heimdal
Synopsis:
Heimdal contains cross-realm vulnerability allowing someone with control
    over a realm to impersonate anyone in the cross-realm trust path.

Background.Text: Heimdal is a free implementation of Kerberos 5.

Description.Text: Heimdal does not properly perform certain consistency checks for cross-realm requests, which allows remote attackers with control of a realm to impersonate others in the cross-realm trust path.

Impact.Text: Remote attackers with control of a realm may be able to impersonate other users in the cross-realm trust path.

Workaround.Text: A workaround is not currently known for this issue. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest version of the affected package.
